title: Point Reyes National Seashore: Outfitters and Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services     Outfitters and Tours                Outfitters and Tours       Bike Rentals  Point Reyes Outdoors, Point Reyes Station, 415-663-8192  Visit our Bicycle Riding at Point Reyes National Seashore page for more information. Kayaking Outfitters  Blue Waters Kayaking and Hiking, Point Reyes Station, 415-669-2600 Clavey Paddlesports, Petaluma, 707-766-8070 Outback Adventures, Larkspur, 415-461-2222 Point Reyes Outdoors Sea Kayaking Tours and Nature Hikes, Point Reyes Station, 415-663-8192 Sea Trek Kayak & Stand Up Paddling Center, Sausalito, 415-332-8494  Visit our Kayaking Around Point Reyes National Seashore page for more information. Stables and Trail Rides  Five Brooks Stables, Olema Valley, 415-663-1570 Horse N Around Trail Rides, Bodega, 707-876-3374  Horse Campground  Stewart's Horse Camp, Olema Valley, 415-663-1362  Visit our Horse Riding at Point Reyes National Seashore page for more information. Whale Watching Boat Trips  Bodega Charters, Bodega Bay, 707-875-3495 Bodega Bay Fishing, Bodega Bay, 707-875-2323 Bodega Bay Sports Fishing Center, Bodega Bay, 707-875-3344 Oceanic Society Expeditions, Ross, 800-326-7491 San Francisco Whale Tours, San Francisco, 415-706-7364 SF Bay Whale Watching, Sausalito, 415-331-6267  Visit our Whale Watching at Point Reyes page for more information. Disclaimer: The National Park Service provides the names and phone numbers of area businesses as a visitor convenience. Inclusion on this list is not an endorsement. Top of Page
